description:
The Ten4Tec Radio Holster is a device that helps you carry your radio or satellite device on your belt, harness, or chest rig.

  • It is made of durable and lightweight nylon and has a Velcro and elastic system that can adjust to fit different sizes and shapes of devices
  • It also has a pass-through and flaps on the back that allow you to attach it to various straps and belts
  • It is a convenient and versatile way to keep your radio or satellite device close and accessible
name: Ten4Tec Radio Holster
